abstract: International House Hunting column; three-story 19th-century mansion in Weald region of Kent County, England, is listed for $3,990,000 million; information about market and tips for buying properties in Britain highlighted.
snippet: As in the rest of Britain, the housing market in Kent fell sharply after the financial crisis and has been slowly rebounding....
lead_paragraph: As in the rest of Britain, the housing market in Kent fell sharply after the financial crisis and has been slowly rebounding.
